title: Emerald Grace Jhumka - పాచికల జుంకా
materials: Base metal Alloy with Gold Plating. AAA grade Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Central round-cut Emerald. Cultured Pearls with High Luster.
features: Classic Jhumka design with a delicate filigree-inspired pattern. The top portion features a floral design with a center Emerald, surrounded by CZ stones. Pearl Drops are added for an elegant touch. Openwork design creates a light and airy feel.
occasions: and special occasions. Complements traditional South Indian attire like sarees and lehengas. Perfect for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function.
description: These Jhumkas combine classic South Indian design with contemporary elegance. The combination of Emeralds, Pearls and CZ stones creates a luxurious look, perfect for adding a touch of glamour to any outfit. The intricate design reflects exceptional craftsmanship and adds cultural value.
